Overload.descr: ;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: Add the given text to the end of this column. ; PARAMETERS: ; text (I,REQ) - Text to add to end. ;---------
;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: Add the given text to the start of this column. ; PARAMETERS: ; text (I,REQ) - Text to add to start. ;---------
;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: Set this column to the given value, but only if there's not already a value in place. ; PARAMETERS: ; text (I,REQ) - Text to default in. ;---------
;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: If this is set, each super-column in the display will be at least this wide. ; PARAMETERS: ; minWidth (I,REQ) - The minimum width (in pixels). ;---------
;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: Replace this column with the given value. ; PARAMETERS: ; text (I,REQ) - Text to replace with. ;---------
;--------- ; DESCRIPTION: If this is set, we'll show the given text as the window title (aka the caption). ; PARAMETERS: ; title (I,REQ) - The title to use. ;---------
